titleStmt.title: Ansvvere made by the kynges hyghnes to the petitions of the rebelles in Yorkeshire
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Bound with STC 13077.5 (formerly STC 15650): Answere to the petitions of the traytours and rebelles in Lyncolneshyre.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
